articles.title: Karman Kaur Thandi wins W60 ITF title in USA - tennis - SportsCafe
articles.description: India tennis player Karman Kaur Thandi won her second W60 ITF title in Evansville, USA, after she beat Ukraine’s fourth seed Yulia Starodubtseva 7-5, 4-6, 6-1 in the final. This happens to be Thandi's first title of the year as well.
